grant.require: REQUIRE NONE WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0;

reader.require: REQUIRE NONE WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0;

createScript.options: ` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;

dataTables.createScript: `.`recipe`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`name` tinytext,`difficulty` tinytext,`prepTime` time,`cookTime` time) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

`.`ingredient`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`recipeId` int(11) NOT NULL,`mainIngredient` tinytext,`quantity` double,`unit` tinytext,`productId` int(11) NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (`recipeId`) REFERENCES `recipe` (`id`),FOREIGN KEY (`productId`) REFERENCES `product` (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

`.`step`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`recipeId` int(11) NOT NULL,`order` int(11) NOT NULL,`text` text NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (`recipeId`) REFERENCES `recipe` (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
`.`product`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`name` tinytext NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
